description: The Donald Wyman Flowering Crab (Malus 'Donald Wyman') is an amazing species of small tree with beautiful deep pink flowers and an elegant, upright form. It's a great choice for any garden thanks to its disease resistance and long bloom time. Its fragrant blossoms attract pollinators and are large enough to be enjoyed from a distance. Donald Wyman Flowering Crab is also extremely easy to grow, tolerating a variety of soils, and is notably winter hardy. It's an excellent choice for adding a touch of color and texture to any garden.
